snippet: The made-for-TV machine is serving the preschool constituency with Nickelodeon’s “Peter Rabbit’s Christmas Tale,” a new animated story based on the Beatrix Potter characters.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television movie Peter Rabbit's Christmas Tale on Nickelodeon.
lead_paragraph: The made-for-TV machine is serving the preschool constituency with Nickelodeon’s “Peter Rabbit’s Christmas Tale,” a new animated story based on the Beatrix Potter characters.

headline.main: Don’t Think About Santa as a Meal
headline.print_headline: Don’t Think About Santa as a Meal
